hero.title: About HEAL Student
hero.description: A global platform representing expert consultants to provide knowledge about psychological health, mental health, and balanced nutrition

paragraph1.brandName: HEAL Student: Health, Emotion, and Active Living
paragraph1.description: is a global platform representing expert consultants to provide explanations, understanding, and knowledge regarding the importance of psychological health, mental health, and balanced nutrition for the body in managing healthy lifestyle patterns.

paragraph2.description: This platform was founded by researchers from several countries
paragraph2.collaboration: who are experts in their fields. We also collaborate with business actors in the industry, startups, and professionals in health and physical fields to develop this free course program.

team.title: Meet Our Expert Team
team.description: This free online course platform is led by researchers and facilitators who are experts in their fields.

philosophy.quote: IN A HEALTHY BODY THERE IS A HEALTHY SOUL
